Sentencas: In this study, methane steam and dry reforming have been investigated, from the perspective of methane conversion, hydrogen yield and the formation of solid carbon.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Different ratios between methane, steam and carbon dioxide were used in order to simulate the methane internal reforming in a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) with anode off gas recirculation.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Thermodynamic equilibrium modelling was first employed to determine the concentrations of each gas in the equilibrium state.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: Crushed anode substrate material of a commercial SOFC half-cell was used as catalyst in the practical experiments.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: The modelling results showed that at 750 degrees C (1023 K), above 90% of methane conversion was found in all cases and carbon was formed when the oxygen to carbon (O/C) ratio was lower than 1.2.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: The experimental results showed that poor methane conversion rates (around 20%) were found within the steam reforming.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation

Sentencas: The performance was highly affected by the total fuel flow rate and carbon formation could still be found in cases for the O/C ratio above 1.5.
Titulo: Methane internal reforming in solid oxide fuel cells with anode off-gas recirculation
